entry.title: DRMAAv2 Root Specification - bug #19: Bindings should be allow to change Job::wait... signature
entry.content:
• Status changed from submitted to accepted

OGF35 meeting agreed to change the root spec return type to void, since chaining optimization is anyway language specific.

entry.title: DRMAAv2 Root Specification - bug #19: Bindings should be allow to change Job::wait... signature
entry.content:
• Status changed from accepted to closed

Accepted, part of the September 2012 errata version of the root spec

http://www.ogf.org/pipermail/drmaa-wg/2012-August/001491.html
